participant_1.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.

participant_2.background: i'm always wearing a hat. i've a broken arm. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.

content.text:
Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?.
Cut a long story short: i play several instruments
